description: Creates registration for a device token and a chat contact to receive real-time push notifications. For more information about push notifications, see Set up push notifications in Amazon Connect for mobile chat in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: PinpointAppArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Pinpoint application.

parameters.name: DeviceToken
parameters.description: The push notification token issued by the Apple or Google gateways.

parameters.name: DeviceType
parameters.description: The device type to use when sending the message.

parameters.name: ContactConfiguration
parameters.description: The contact configuration for push notification registration. The identifier of the contact within the Amazon Connect instance. ParticipantRole (string) --- The role of the participant in the chat conversation. IncludeRawMessage (boolean) --- Whether to include raw connect message in the push notification payload. Default is False.

nested_params.name: ContactId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the contact within the Amazon Connect instance.

nested_params.name: ParticipantRole
nested_params.description: The role of the participant in the chat conversation.

nested_params.name: IncludeRawMessage
nested_params.description: Whether to include raw connect message in the push notification payload. Default is False.
